messages.subject: [SHQ] Any idea what this might be?
messages.msgSnippet: This is a little off topic, but I got this gift from a friend who went to Japan ages ago, and it s super awesome and all, but I have no idea what it is and
messages.messageBody:
This is a little off topic, but I got this gift from a friend who went to
Japan ages ago, and it's super awesome and all, but I have no idea what it
is and neither does my friend.
So I scanned it to show you, maybe you'll know what it is.

http://img29.photobucket.com/albums/v86/mibella/what-001.jpg

The little round thing in the middle is made out of porcelin (I'm guessing
it is, anyway), and it's attached to the 21st page, poking out through the
pages before the twenty first. It is a book, and there's some writing on the
cover as you can see, though I can't read it.

http://img29.photobucket.com/albums/v86/mibella/what-002.jpg

And this is what it looks like after the 21st page, again there's some
writing in the top right, and it's the same on all of the other pages, but
again, I can't read it. That in the middle is a printed copy of what's on
the twenty first page, obviously.

So I have no idea what this is and what it's for...if you know, could you
please tell me? My curiousity is killing me!!

Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."
